resources:
Firebase Cloud Messaging Click the SUBSCRIBE TO WEATHER button below to subscribe to the weather topic. Messages sent to the weather topic will be received. The LOG TOKEN button logs the FCM registration token to logcat. Subscribe To Weather Log Token
Subscribed to weather topic FCM registration Token: %s
fcm_default_channel
Weather
Failed to subscribe to weather topic FCM Message
Notifications permission granted FCM can\'t post notifications without POST_NOTIFICATIONS permission
See README for setup instructions"
